bibl.title: U. WARTENBERG and R.A. COLES, N. GONIS, M.W. HASLAM, J.D. THOMAS, with contributions by P.G. McC. BROWN, G.B. D'ALESSIO, R. LUISELLI, M. MAEHLER, P.J. PARSONS, J.R. REA, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXIV (Nos 4401-4441). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 84.)
bibl.note: et XIX pll., dont 1 pl. dépl.
P. Oxy. LXIV, 4401-4441. - I. New Testament (4401-4406). - II. Comedy (4407-4412). - III. Hellenistic Poets (4413-4432). - IV. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (4433-4441).
